title: Updating search keywords
contents:
mode_edit

更新搜索关键字link

Updating search keywordslink

在文档中，能够找到你需要的内容与内容本身一样重要。在angular.io中，用户可以通过多种方式发现内容，包括：

In documentation, being able to find the content you need is equally as important as the content itself. In angular.io, users can discover content in several ways, including:

  • 自然搜索结果，例如通过google.com

    Organic search results, such as through google.com

  • 左侧导航栏，也称为 sidenav

    The left navigation bar, also known as sidenav

  • 使用标题中的搜索框

    Using the search box in the header

你可以通过向给定主题添加搜索关键字来帮助改善文档体验。更新搜索关键字可以帮助用户更快地找到他们需要的内容。

You can help improve the documentation experience by adding search keywords to a given topic. Updating search keywords can help bring users to the content they need faster.

在你开始之前link

Before you beginlink

即使你以前从未为 Angular 做出过贡献，也可以更新主题的搜索关键字。但是，如果你在存储库中提交第一个 Pull Request，可能会发现提供对 Angular 的贡献指南会很有帮助。

You can update search keywords for a topic even if you've never contributed to Angular before. However, you may find it helpful to have the Contributing to Angular guide available if you're filing your first pull request in the repository.

更新搜索关键字link

Updating search keywordslink

要更新搜索关键字：

To update search keywords:

  1. 导航到要更新搜索关键字的主题。

    Navigate to the topic to which you want to update search keywords.

  2. 确定你要添加到主题的搜索关键字。有关如何格式化关键字的信息，请参阅搜索关键字格式。

    Decide what search keywords you'd like to add to the topic. For information on how to format keywords, see Search keywords format.

  3. 通过GitHub 用户界面或 Angular 的标准 Pull Request 过程更新 @searchKeywords 标签。

    Update the @searchKeywords tag, either through the GitHub user interface or through Angular's standard pull request process.

    如果某个主题没有 @searchKeywords 标签，你可以将其添加到主题的末尾。

    If a topic does not have a @searchKeywords tag, you can add it to the end of the topic.

搜索关键字格式link

Search keywords formatlink

你可以使用 @searchKeywords 标签将搜索关键字添加到主题。此标记采用一组单个单词，以空格分隔。标签和关键字必须用大括号 ( { } ) 字符括起来。例如：

You add search keywords to a topic using the @searchKeywords tag. This tag takes a set of single words, separated by spaces. The tag and the keywords must be enclosed in curly bracket ({ }) characters. For example:

最后复查时间： 2/28/2022
